hook.text: A woman in a coma left written instructions: 'Do not resuscitate.' Her family begs doctors to save her.

buildup.text: Advance directives let people specify their treatment wishes in case they lose the ability to communicate.

discovery.text: Living wills and healthcare proxies ensure your values guide decisions even when you can't speak for yourself.

twist.text: Most people don't have advance directivesâ€”leaving families to guess their wishes during the worst moments.

climax.text: A clear advance directive protects both the patient's wishes and the family from unbearable guilt.

punchline.text: Plan your voice before you lose it.

quiz.question: Why are advance directives important?
options: They ensure your treatment wishes are followed when you can't communicate
They give doctors permission to perform any treatment they choose
They are only needed for patients over age 80
